channel.title: New Class Suggestion - The Runekeeper/Runecaster
channel.description:
Yeah another phone suggestion. But this class will probably suck early game. Late game. Better.
---------
The Runekeeper - Blue Dragon Offensive (Support?)
Rune Of Determination (Passive) - Immune to occupation, redirection abilities.
Rune Of Protection (Day Ability) - Immune to death tonight (2 uses)
Rune Of Empowerment (Night Ability) - Prevent visits to a target. They must be a certain class type.
Rune of Stunning (Day Ability) - Prevent any further abilities used by target and further voting from them (3 uses)
--------
The Runecaster - Unseen Offensive.
*Keeps the Rune of Determination*
Rune Of Instinct (Night Ability) Prevent all players of the same princess flirt result. You will learn if they are K/O, S/S, S/I. You can not target fellow unseen members.
*Keeps Rune of Stunning but now with unlimited uses*
--------
Ok I tried to balance this out... I think unseen is OP a bit This class is non-unique, Convertible. This class is Immune to death, Occupation, Redirection

item.title: New Class Suggestion - The Runekeeper/Runecaster
item.dc:creator: Geyde
item.description:
SabreOverdrive:

But this class will probably suck early game. Late game. Better.

That is quite literally how every offensive class functions

SabreOverdrive:

Rune Of Protection (Passive) - Immune to occupation, redirection abilities and death. If this class is attacked and is death immune. This passive is lost.

Reword this to:

Rune of Protection (Passive) - Immune to most occupation and redirection abilities. Night immune once. Once attacked, lose this passive.

Making this class night immune once presents a major roadblock for the unseen/cult. Being night immune once as a BD class is really annoying for evils.

I would remove the death immunity, and add a day ability with maybe 2 uses that would function similarly, giving death immunity for the night.

SabreOverdrive:

Rune Of Empowerment (Night Ability) - Prevent visits to a target. They must be a certain class type.

How I’m assuming it works is that the player selects the class type that cannot connect. If so, this is pretty balanced. I would have no problems with it.

SabreOverdrive:

Rune of Stunning (Day Ability) - Prevent any further abilities used by target and further voting from them (3 uses)

A major problem with many classes is being easily confirmed. I would add that the target of this ability will not know that their abilities/votes aren’t working.

SabreOverdrive:

Rune Of Instinct (Night Ability) Prevent all players of the same princess flirt result. You will learn if they are K/O, S/S, S/I. You can not target fellow unseen members.

Again, I’m assuming you pick a flirt type and that is the effect. Seemsgoodman

SabreOverdrive:

Keeps Rune of Stunning but now with unlimited uses

Same rules applied from the original stunning I reviewed, just be worried about it being broken.
